actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Joint resolution to provide that the August 1975 congressional recess shall not be included in calculating the 20-calendar period during which the Congress may disapprove the proposed sale of a defense article or service under the Foreign Military Sales Act.

summary.text: Provides that the August 1975 congressional recess shall not be included in calculating the twenty-calendar-day period during which the Congress may disapprove the proposed sale of a defense article or service under the Foreign Military Sales Act.

titles.title: Joint resolution to provide that the August 1975 congressional recess shall not be included in calculating the 20-calendar period during which the Congress may disapprove the proposed sale of a defense article or service under the Foreign Military Sales Act.
